td.content: s:patient presents with 8 days history of mild low back pain and mild pain radiating from the back to the buttocks. she is a female underwriter aged 61 Ys. she denies drinking alcohol patient reports that she smokes once or twice daily o:Height 66 in, Weight 126 lbs, Temperature 97.8 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 62, Respiration 14, patient appears in mild distress due to back pain a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Estrogens - 0.3 mg po qd, and ordered lumbar XRY, Skeletal System DEXA scan.

td.content: s:a white F underwriter aged 61 years presents with mild pain radiating from the back to the buttocks x 4 weeks. pt also complains of mild low back pain. she has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking denies any alcohol use o:Height 67 in, Weight 131 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17, Back= mild tenderness of lumbar spine area, decrease ROM in all direction a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Alendronate sodium - 70 mg po q week, and ordered CBC, HLA B27, spine XRY.

Value.Value: ordered CBC , HLA B 27 , spine XRY

content2.Value: ordered CBC , HLA B 27 , spine XRY

td.content: Do not IV Fluid and Support
